actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-806, by Mr. Moakley.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 5044 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. After general debate the bill shall be considered for amendment under the five-minute rule for a period not to exceed three hours. Measure will be read by section. Bill is open to amendments. No amendment shall be in order unless printed in the portion of the Congressional Record designated for that purpose.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 237.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5044) to establish the American Heritage Areas Partnership Program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5044 (American Heritage Areas Partnership Program).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5044) to establish the American Heritage Areas Partnership Program, and for other purposes.
